State.Name: M.U.X. Series - Interface Overhaul

State.Author: Sigerious
State.Description: Modern replacer for stagger (aka crippling) animations made via motion capture. Light, smooth and not over the top. Bring your game closer to modern standards.
State.Name: Modern Stagger animations

State.Author: irishbutcher
State.Description: Adds palm trees with lights to the Strip.
State.Name: Strip Palm Trees
